title: Ecommerece Farm Project
description: The system is built on a modern Client-Server model. The frontend is developed using Next.js for optimized speed and responsiveness, while the backend uses NestJS to manage APIs and data logic. PostgreSQL is used for data storage. The AI model is based on PhoBeat (fine-tuned from PhoBERT), trained on a curated dataset of over 350 crop diseases. The model predicts disease names and treatment plans from textual descriptions.

title: My Portfolio Website
description: This portfolio website is built using Next.js , Tailwind CSS and deployed on Vercel, showcasing my projects, skills, and experience. It features smooth animations with Framer Motion and a responsive design to ensure optimal viewing on all devices.

title: Booking Homestay Simple Project
description: The Booking Homestay project is a web application for searching and booking homestays, featuring various amenities. Three actors of this project include Client, Landlord and Admin.
